DOC.brief_summary: This study will explore the safety and effectiveness of different doses of AGN 203818 in treating the pain associated with fibromyalgia syndrome. The study is being conducted in 2 parts. Part A enrolled 211 pts dosed with either 3, 20, 60 mg BID AGN 203818 or placebo over 4 week treatment duration. Part B will enroll 440 pts and dose with either 20, 100, 160 mg BID AGN 203818 or placebo over 12 week treatment duration.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of AGN 203818 for Pain Associated With Fibromyalgia Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of fibromyalgia syndrome Moderate or severe pain associated with fibromyalgia Any other uncontrolled disease Pregnant or nursing females
